Health Centre

77 French Village Road
Kingsclear First Nation, NB
E3E 1K3

Tel: (506) 363-4001

Gayle Kelly, Director
khw@kingsclear.ca

Hours of Operation

Monday - Thursday: 9:00AM - 4:30PM (closed for lunch)
Friday: 9:00AM - 12:00PM
Saturday - Sunday: Closed

General Information and Services

Physicians

Dr. Saira Athar is a community based family physician and has expressed an interest in the community and is giving one day a week of her time for primary care for all members of the community. She sees patients every Wednesday from 9:00 am â€“ 12noon at the Health Centre and patients at the Wik-Chiplakon, by appointments only. Appointments can be made by calling Amanda at the front desk 363-4001.

Dr. Athar has been with us for almost a year. We are very fortunate to have this opportunity as many of us lack a family physician.

Community Health Nursing

  • Prenatal/Postnatal:
    • Milk Program
    • Prenatal Classes
    • Car Safety
  • Well Baby Clinics
  • Immunization/Flu Shot Clinics
  • School Age Health Education
  • Chronic Disease Screening & Education:
    • Blood Pressure Clinics
    • Diabetes Screening
    • Footcare

  • Client Assessment
  • Home Care Nursing
  • Health Monitoring
  • Footcare
  • In Home Respite

Mental Wellness

  • Referrals & Information Sessions
  • Access to Mental Health Nurse

  • Assessment & Addictions Counseling
  • Referral Information for Detox
  • Referral to Treatment Centres
  • Transportation to Detox/Treatment

  • Liason for Non-Insured Health Benefits:

    • Vision
    • Dental
    • Pharmacy, Medical Supplies & Equipment
    • Mental Health

Latest News

Mental Wellness Evaluation Web Survey

(04/23/2015)

Notice to Community

As you may know, the Office of Evaluation at Health Canada is leading an evaluation of the First Nations and Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB) Mental Wellness Programs. As one component of this evaluation (called a Program Cluster Evaluation), FNIHB is asking for feedback about how its Mental Wellness programs are working. FNIHB has contracted our company, Horizons Community Development Associates (www.horizonscda.ca) to help with this work.

Read More >
